summary: This document is an FBI 302 interview summary of a witness, referred to as 'Jane Doe 1' (JD1), detailing her experiences as a minor providing sexualized massages for Jeffrey Epstein. It describes the recruitment process by Ghislaine Maxwell and another associate, the routine of the massages at Epstein's Palm Beach home, financial arrangements, and the involvement of others. The summary was prepared by an AUSA for direct testimony preparation.

persons.name: Jane Doe 1
persons.context: The primary witness providing testimony. She describes being recruited around age 14 to give sexualized massages to Jeffrey Epstein, which continued for several years. She details interactions with Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and others.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as JE. The individual for whom Jane Doe 1 provided paid sexualized massages at his Palm Beach home, starting when she was a minor. He is described engaging in sexual acts during the massages.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to by her last name. Assisted in recruiting and scheduling Jane Doe 1 for massages with Epstein. She is described asking personal questions, providing gifts, and on occasion being present during massages.

persons.name: Sarah
persons.context: A friend of Jane Doe 1 who initially recruited her, drove her to Epstein's house, and later took over scheduling calls from Maxwell. She is described as younger than Maxwell.

persons.name: Jane Doe 1's Mother
persons.context: Described as addicted to crack and alcohol. Phone calls from Maxwell or Sarah to schedule massages would sometimes come to her phone.

persons.name: Maria
persons.context: A friend Jane Doe 1 brought to Epstein's house for massages. She was about 17 years old.

persons.name: Maria's Little Sister
persons.context: A friend Jane Doe 1 brought to Epstein's house for massages. She was about 15 years old.

persons.name: AUSA Det
persons.context: The Assistant United States Attorney who prepared the witness for direct testimony and coordinated the initial call with the witness's mother.

connections.description: Maxwell recruited and scheduled minors, including Jane Doe 1, for sexualized massages with Epstein at his Palm Beach home.
Sarah, a friend, initially recruited Jane Doe 1 by asking if she wanted to make money giving a massage, drove her to Epstein's house, and later handled scheduling calls.
Sarah took over the role of calling Jane Doe 1 to schedule massage appointments after Maxwell had done so for the first year or two.
Jane Doe 1 provided over 100 paid sexualized massages to Epstein starting when she was about 14 years old, during which he engaged in sexual acts.
Maxwell was involved in the initial recruitment, scheduling, payment, and gifting of Jane Doe 1. She also asked personal questions and was present during some massages.
Jane Doe 1 brought her friend Maria to Epstein's house for massages, for which she received an extra $200.

events.title: First Recruitment and Massage
events.description: Jane Doe 1, approximately 14 years old, is recruited by her friend Sarah and taken to Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach home. There, Ghislaine Maxwell instructs Sarah to show her what to do. Jane Doe 1 participates in her first sexualized massage with Epstein.

events.title: Series of Paid Massages
events.description: Jane Doe 1 provides over 100 paid sexualized massages to Jeffrey Epstein, approximately 2-3 times per week, until she was about 18 or 19 years old.

events.title: Maxwell's Inappropriate Conduct
events.description: On two occasions when Jane Doe 1 was about 15, Ghislaine Maxwell entered the massage room while she was nude. The second time, Maxwell fondled her breasts and buttocks, commenting on her body being nice for 'Mr. Epstein's friends.'

events.title: Photoshoot by Sarah
events.description: Sarah took nude and clothed photographs of Jane Doe 1 at Epstein's property, both inside and outside, for which Jane Doe 1 was paid $500.

events.title: Witness Preparation Call
events.description: An AUSA and the FBI called Jane Doe 1's mother to arrange for Jane Doe 1 to meet with the government to provide testimony about her experiences with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Jeffrey Epstein's house on Palm Beach off the intercoastal (initially pink, later painted white)
Thailand (mentioned as a place Epstein said he traveled)
An island owned by Epstein (likely Little St. James)
keyFacts: Jane Doe 1 was approximately 14 years old when first recruited by her friend Sarah to give a 'massage' at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach home, where the encounter quickly became sexual.
Ghislaine Maxwell was directly involved in the initial recruitment, scheduling, and payment of Jane Doe 1, and maintained a black book with contact numbers for victims.
Jane Doe 1 provided over 100 paid 'sexualized massages' for Epstein over several years, typically receiving $300-$400, with payments increasing for removing clothing or bringing other girls.
Maxwell engaged in sexually inappropriate conduct with Jane Doe 1 on at least one occasion, fondling her and commenting on her body being for 'Epstein's friends.'

The witness details a systematic operation: recruitment of minors, routine scheduling via phone calls, use of gifts (lingerie, books) as grooming tools, and a fixed location (Epstein's Palm Beach bathroom) for the abuse.
